name: GraPplE PLumBer
description:
GraPplE PLumBer

GraPplE PLumBer is an exciting 2D platformer game that will challenge your skills and agility. As the player, you will use a grappling hook to traverse through each level and reach the portal at the end. With just a left click of the mouse, you can throw the grappling hook towards a platform, and it will connect to the point where it hits.

But it's not just a matter of throwing the hook and crossing your mouse - you must strategically plan your path by clicking the right mouse button to navigate where the hook will attach. By connecting the hook to multiple points, you can create a path that allows you to traverse across the platforms and avoid obstacles.

As you progress through each level, you'll encounter locked doors that require a key to unlock. Keep an eye out for these keys as they are crucial to advancing through the game. With a total of 5 levels, each one increasing in difficulty, you'll need to hone your skills and master the use of the grappling hook to complete the game.

Are you up for the challenge? Download GraPplE PLumBer now and put your platforming skills to the test!

Credits: 

  • Coding Beast  For developing and implementing all the game features
  • rexlandish   For making such an awesome sound effects and musics for the game
  • pandagooess For creating such an eye-catching and awesome art and  for making levels.
